armor.name: Heavy Armor
armor.penalty: Heavy (Disadvantage on Stealth, Dodge, Athletics). Slow (Cannot Dash).

armor.name: Shield
armor.description: Wood or steel shield. Enables Block action.

gear.name: Backpack
gear.effect: Required to carry items hands-free. Does not add slots, but enables storage.

gear.name: Bedroll
gear.effect: Required for Long Rest in wilderness to prevent Exhaustion.

gear.name: Chain (10ft)
gear.effect: Heavy iron. DC 18 Strength check to burst.

gear.name: Chalk (10)
gear.effect: Mark paths in labyrinth. Free Slot.

gear.name: Crowbar
gear.effect: Advantage on Athletics checks to pry open doors/chests.

gear.name: Grappling Hook
gear.effect: Attached to rope. Allows anchoring for climbing without a check.

gear.name: Hammer
gear.effect: For pitons/construction. Simple weapon (1d4).

gear.name: Lock
gear.effect: Simple iron lock (DC 13 to pick).

gear.name: Manacles
gear.effect: Restrains a target. Escape DC 15 (STR/DEX).

gear.name: Mirror (Steel)
gear.effect: Peek around corners or reflect gaze attacks.

gear.name: Pitons (5)
gear.effect: Secure climbing points. Reduces climbing DC by 2.

gear.name: Pole (10ft)
gear.effect: Wooden. Trigger traps from safe distance.

gear.name: Rope (50ft)
gear.effect: Hemp. Supports 300lbs.

gear.name: Sack
gear.effect: Holds 1 Slot worth of loose items (e.g., 100 coins).

gear.name: Spike Strip
gear.effect: Action: Deploy in 5ft square. Difficult Terrain. 1d4 dmg if walked on.

gear.name: Spyglass
gear.effect: See detail at 1 mile. Advantage on Scrutiny at range.

gear.name: Tent (2-Person)
gear.effect: Required for Long Rest in harsh weather.

gear.name: Candles (5)
gear.effect: Dim Light (5ft radius). Burns for 1 hour (6 Turns).

gear.name: Flint & Steel
gear.effect: Required to light fires. Free Slot.

gear.name: Lantern
gear.effect: Bright Light (30ft radius). Requires Oil. Can be shuttered.

gear.name: Oil (3 Flasks)
gear.effect: Fuel for Lanterns (1 Flask = 3 Hours). Flammable.

gear.name: Rations (3 Days)
gear.effect: Preserved food. Must eat 1 Day's worth daily or gain Exhausted.

gear.name: Torches (3)
gear.effect: Bright Light (20ft radius). Burns for 1 hour (6 Turns). One hand.

gear.name: Waterskin
gear.effect: Holds 1 day of water.

gear.name: Alchemist's Kit
gear.effect: Crafting Alchemical Reagents (Acids, Bombs). Identifying potions.

gear.name: Crafting Kit
gear.effect: Repairing items in the field. Crafting mechanical gadgets.

gear.name: Disguise Kit
gear.effect: Creating disguises. Contains makeup, wigs, dyes.

gear.name: Forgery Kit
gear.effect: Creating fake documents and seals.

gear.name: Herbalism Kit
gear.effect: Crafting poultices and antidotes. Harvesting flora.

gear.name: Medicine Kit
gear.effect: Stabilizing the Dying. Ending Bleeding condition.

gear.name: Poisoner's Kit
gear.effect: Crafting and safely applying toxins.

gear.name: Thieves' Tools
gear.effect: Picking locks and disarming mechanical traps.

gear.name: Inn Stay (Night)
gear.effect: Safe haven rest. Good quality costs 2g.

gear.name: Hot Meal
gear.effect: Tavern food. Feast costs 1g.

gear.name: Hireling (Day)
gear.effect: Porter (carries gear). Mercenary costs 5g + loot share.

materials.name: Organics Bundle
materials.description: Used for Poisons, Acids, and Adrenaline. (3 Bundles = 1 Slot).

materials.name: Flora Bundle
materials.description: Used for Healing, Cures, and Utility. (3 Bundles = 1 Slot).

materials.name: Scrap Bundle
materials.description: Used for Explosives, Gadgets, and Traps. (3 Bundles = 1 Slot).

materials.name: Essence Bundle
materials.description: Used for Magical Inks, Enchantments, and High-Tier items. (3 Bundles = 1 Slot).

reagents.name: Acid Flask
reagents.effect: Thrown (30ft). Deal 2d6 Acid Damage. Ignores Armor. Can melt locks.

reagents.name: Alchemist's Fire
reagents.effect: Thrown (30ft). Deal 1d6 Fire Damage + Burning condition.

reagents.name: Adrenaline Shot
reagents.effect: Action (Touch). Target gains 1d8 Temp HP and Advantage on STR/CON checks (1 min).

reagents.name: Stone-Skin Elixir
reagents.effect: Action (Self). Gain +1 Armor Score for 1 minute.

reagents.name: Flashbomb
reagents.effect: Thrown (30ft). 10ft Radius. Creatures must save vs. Fortitude or be Blinded (1 round).

reagents.name: Smoke Bomb
reagents.effect: Thrown (30ft). 10ft Radius cloud. Heavily Obscured (blocks sight) for 1 minute.

reagents.name: Glue Bomb
reagents.effect: Thrown (30ft). 5ft Radius. Creatures must save vs. Reflex or be Restrained (Speed 0).

reagents.name: Healing Salve
reagents.effect: Action (Touch). Restore 2d4 Hit Points to a living creature.

reagents.name: Stamina Brew
reagents.effect: Action (Self). Immediately regain 1d4 Stamina (STA).

reagents.name: Antidote
reagents.effect: Action (Touch). Ends the Poisoned condition.

reagents.name: Burn Balm
reagents.effect: Action (Touch). Ends the Burning condition.

reagents.name: Focus Tincture
reagents.effect: Action (Self). Ends the Dazed or Confused condition.

reagents.name: Basic Toxin
reagents.effect: Coating. On next hit, target is Poisoned (1d6 dmg/turn) for 1 minute.

reagents.name: Befuddling Toxin
reagents.effect: Coating. On next hit, target must save vs. Fortitude or be Dazed (1 round).

reagents.name: Weakening Toxin
reagents.effect: Coating. On next hit, target must save vs. Fortitude or be Weakened (1 minute).

reagents.name: Paralytic Toxin
reagents.effect: Coating. On next hit, target must save vs. Fortitude or be Stunned (1 round).

reagents.name: Caltrops
reagents.effect: Action. Cover 10ft square. Area is Difficult Terrain. Moving through deals 1d4 dmg.

reagents.name: Snare Trap
reagents.effect: Action. Set in a space. Next creature to enter must save vs. Reflex or be Grappled.

reagents.name: Bell Tripwire
reagents.effect: Action. Alarm trap. Emits a loud ringing if crossed.

reagents.name: Grease Vial
reagents.effect: Thrown. 10ft square becomes slippery. Save vs. Reflex or fall Prone.

reagents.name: Noisemaker
reagents.effect: Thrown. Clockwork device. Ticks/whirrs loudly for 1 minute to distract guards.

reagents.name: Spring-Dagger
reagents.effect: Action. Set in a space. Next creature to enter takes 2d6 damage (Reflex save avoids).

reagents.name: Disguise Supplies
reagents.effect: Action. Consumed to apply a disguise. Grants Advantage on Deception to mimic a persona.

reagents.name: Forged Paper
reagents.effect: Downtime. Create fake orders, travel papers, or identification.

tier_1.name: Curio
tier_1.desc: Lucky rabbit's foot or love letter.

tier_1.name: Minor Reagent
tier_1.desc: Vial of slime or patch of moss.

tier_2.name: Trade Good
tier_2.desc: Bolt of silk or cask of spices.

curios.name: Coin of Whispers
curios.effect: Repeats the last 5 words spoken near it when squeezed.

curios.name: Lantern of Revealing
curios.effect: Bright Light (30ft). Reveals Invisible creatures as ghostly outlines.

curios.name: Rope of Climbing
curios.effect: 50ft silk rope. Snakes upward and knots itself on command.

curios.name: Bag of Holding
curios.effect: Holds 50 Slots/500lbs. Weighs 1 Slot. Retrieval is an Action.

curios.name: Chime of Opening
curios.effect: 1/Day. Unlocks one non-magical lock or latch.

curios.name: Dust of Dryness
curios.effect: Pinch destroys 100 gallons of water (or 4d6 dmg to Water Elementals).

curios.name: Ever-Burning Torch
curios.effect: Cold flame. Never consumes fuel. Casts light like a torch.

curios.name: Goggles of Night
curios.effect: Grants Darkvision 60ft while worn.

curios.name: Immovable Rod
curios.effect: stays fixed in space when button pressed. Holds 4,000lbs. DC 25 STR to move.

curios.name: Sending Stones
curios.effect: Pair. Speak into one to be heard from the other (any distance).

curios.name: Decanter of Water
curios.effect: Pour endless fresh water. Geyser mode knocks targets Prone (5ft).

curios.name: Helm of Comprehension
curios.effect: Wearer can read (but not speak) any written language.

curios.name: Cloak of the Bat
curios.effect: Advantage on Stealth in dim light. 1/Day: Polymorph into Bat (1 hour).

curios.name: Ring of Feather Fall
curios.effect: Wearer takes no damage from falling (Auto-activate).

curios.name: Gem of Brightness
curios.effect: 50 Charges. 1: Light. 5: Blind creature (CON Save). Crumbles when empty.

curios.name: Skeleton Key
curios.effect: Bone key opens any standard door. 1-in-6 chance to break per use.

curios.name: Folding Boat
curios.effect: Box unfolds into 10ft rowboat (or 20ft sloop) on command.

curios.name: Boots of Striding
curios.effect: Speed is not reduced by Encumbrance or Difficult Terrain.

curios.name: Wand of Secrets
curios.effect: 3 Charges/Day. Pulsates when within 30ft of secret door/trap.

curios.name: Portable Hole
curios.effect: Cloth circle opens extra-dimensional pit (6ft deep) on any surface.

tier_1.name: Silent
tier_1.effect: Misses from Hiding do not reveal position.

tier_1.name: Silvered
tier_1.effect: Counts as Silver. +1 Dmg vs Shapechangers/Devils.

tier_1.name: Duelist's
tier_1.effect: +1 Dmg if wielding no other weapon/shield.

tier_2.name: Glacial-Edge
tier_2.effect: Deals +1d6 Cold. Crit: Target Speed Halved.

tier_2.name: Storm-Strike
tier_2.effect: Deals +1d6 Lightning. Crit: Target loses Reaction.

tier_2.name: Viper-Fang
tier_2.effect: Deals +1d6 Poison. Crit: Target Poisoned (1 min).

tier_2.name: Corrosive
tier_2.effect: Deals +1d6 Acid. Crit: Sunder Armor (-1 AS).

tier_2.name: Hunter
tier_2.effect: +2d6 Dmg vs chosen Family. Advantage to Track.

tier_2.name: Wounding
tier_2.effect: Damage cannot be healed until next turn.

tier_2.name: Swift
tier_2.effect: First round: Make one extra attack.

tier_2.name: Spell-Stored
tier_2.effect: Store 2 MP spell. Casts on next Hit.

tier_2.name: Thunderous
tier_2.effect: Crit: 10ft Shockwave deals 1d8 Thunder to all.

tier_3.name: Life-Drinker
tier_3.effect: Heal equal to Necrotic Dmg dealt.

tier_3.name: Siege-Breaker
tier_3.effect: Double Dmg vs Objects. Ignores Physical Resist.

tier_3.name: Mind-Shatter
tier_3.effect: +1d8 Psychic. Hit: Target -1d4 on next roll.

tier_3.name: Exterminator
tier_3.effect: +3d6 vs Family. No Disadvantage vs them.

tier_3.name: Speed
tier_3.effect: Bonus Action: Make one extra attack.

tier_3.name: Spell-Lord
tier_3.effect: Store 10 MP spells. Cast as Bonus Action.

tier_3.name: Vorpal
tier_3.effect: Crit 19-20. Crit vs Head = Instant Death.

tier_1.name: Hardened
tier_1.effect: Immune to Critical Hit extra effects.

tier_1.name: Lightweight
tier_1.effect: Weight (Slots) halved. Sleep in armor ok.

tier_1.name: Camouflaged
tier_1.effect: Advantage on Stealth in specific terrain.

tier_2.name: Fire-Ward
tier_2.effect: DR 3 vs Fire. Immune to Burning.

tier_2.name: Poison-Ward
tier_2.effect: DR 3 vs Poison. Immune to Poisoned.

tier_2.name: Acid-Ward
tier_2.effect: DR 3 vs Acid. Immune to Melting.

tier_2.name: Retaliating
tier_2.effect: Reaction when hit melee: Deal 1d4 Dmg.

tier_2.name: Mithril
tier_2.effect: Counts as one category lighter (e.g., Heavy->Medium).

tier_2.name: Blurring
tier_2.effect: 1/Day: 1 min, attacks against you have Disadvantage.

tier_2.name: Ghostly
tier_2.effect: Move through enemies. No Opportunity Attacks.

tier_2.name: Necro-Ward
tier_2.effect: DR 3 vs Necrotic. Undead passive to you.

tier_2.name: Beast-Ward
tier_2.effect: Beasts must pass Will Save DC 15 to attack you.

tier_2.name: Vengeful
tier_2.effect: Take Dmg: +1 to next Attack vs that foe.

tier_2.name: Adamantine
tier_2.effect: Immune to Crits. DR 1 vs Physical.

tier_3.name: Infernal
tier_3.effect: Fire Resistance. Hit by melee: Deal 1d6 Fire.

tier_3.name: Razor-Skin
tier_3.effect: Hit by melee: Deal 1d6 Physical Dmg.

tier_3.name: Phoenix
tier_3.effect: Drop to 0 HP: Explode 2d6 Fire, Regain 10 HP.

tier_3.name: Reflective
tier_3.effect: Crit Success vs Spell: Reflect spell back.

tier_3.name: Dragon
tier_3.effect: Resistance to Element. +1 AS. Adv vs Breath.

tier_3.name: Titan
tier_3.effect: Count as Large. STR Score becomes 22 (+6).

tier_3.name: Nemesis
tier_3.effect: +2 Defense vs Family. Adv on Saves.

tier_3.name: Flight
tier_3.effect: Gain Fly Speed equal to Walk Speed.

tier_3.name: Invulnerable
tier_3.effect: 1/Day: Immune to ALL Damage for 1 Round.

tier_2.name: Spider-Walk
tier_2.effect: Gain Climb Speed. Walk on ceilings.

tier_3.name: Mastery
tier_3.effect: Advantage on ALL checks with chosen Skill.

tier_3.name: Fate
tier_3.effect: Luck Pool refreshes to 3 at dawn.
